name: quakec
description: A QuakeC Language Extension for VS Code
author: Joshua Skelton

quakec.language.description: Automatically assigns defaults for compiler feature flags based on a specific language.

quakec.features.description: Feature flags for specific parser features.

binarySubtractRequiresLeadingWhitespace.description: Whether or not the binary - operator requires a whitespace before the right-hand operand if it is a literal

ternaryOperator.description: Whether or not the ternary ? : operator is supported.

ternaryOperatorShorthand.description: Whether or not the binary ?: operator is supported.

scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../parser && npm install && cd ..
